page.title: 15RECREATION
page.content: On local estates, there are few recreational areas apart from some open playing spaces. Locally there are four public houses. Between them they offer a wide range of restaurant facilities, discos and the occasional barbecue. Bramcote Park provides a source of recreational use. It has a cricket square, pavilion and a training area for the Nottingham Hoods, American football team. On the nearby school playing field there is a running track and several tennis courts available to the public. There are two golf courses in the area. One is private and very exclusive, the other is available to the public. There are numerous public footpaths and bridleways.
